caption: Set drawing style
doc: This action change the drawing style.

ADw.caption: Stroke
ADw.doc: A boolean value (default: true) determining if a stroke should be drawn around shapes.
ADw.name: stroke

ADx.caption: Stroke color
ADx.doc: A string (default: 'black') specifying the color of the stroke.
ADx.name: color

ADy.caption: Stroke weight
ADy.doc: A number (default: 1) defining the width of the stroke in pixels.
ADy.name: weight

ADz.caption: Stroke opacity
ADz.doc: A number between 0 and 1 (default: 1) setting the opacity of the stroke.
ADz.name: opacity

AEA.caption: Line cap
AEA.doc: A string (default: 'butt') specifying the shape of the end of lines. Options are 'butt', 'round', or 'square'.
AEA.name: lineCap

AEB.caption: Line join
AEB.doc: A string (default: 'round') determining how line segments are joined. Options are 'miter', 'round', or 'bevel'.
AEB.name: lineJoin

AEC.caption: Polygon fill
AEC.doc: A boolean value (default: true) indicating whether to fill shapes.
AEC.name: fill

AED.caption: Fill color
AED.doc: A string (default: 'black') specifying the fill color of shapes.
AED.name: fillColor

AEE.caption: Fill opacity
AEE.doc: A number between 0 and 1 (default: 0.5) setting the opacity of the fill.
AEE.name: fillOpacity

AEl.caption: Show distance
AEl.doc: A boolean value indicating whether to display distance information.
AEl.name: show_distance
